name: Anime Love Life
summary: Do you want to recall the high school campus life and love stories in anime games? Experience the girl's simulator love life in high school being a student of different classes in school games. Face ragging by senior students on campus life of high school story in anime girl games offline. The first day of campus life in school games is as exciting as in real love-life school simulator games. Have fun by getting the schoolboys' attention on the high school campus in the love story of school games. Live the teen life of the girl candy boy love of fantasy world every girl simulator dreamed of in the anime girl game. Use the bus to go to school on the first day in anime love school games.
